overview:
Harilaos works as Open Innovation Consultant at Bax & Willems Consulting Venturing in Barcelona, Spain. He has a diploma in Production Engineering & Management from the Technical University of Crete. Before joining B&W, he launched and managed a new social network website in Greece and has held the position of international marketing manager in the non-profit sector.

At B&W he conceives, designs, makes reality and manages high-impact technological innovation projects that usually require the aligned collaboration of the quadriple helix (industry, academia, government, public). His main sectors of expertise are automotive, green technologies, nanotechnology, composite materials, batteries and mobiles.
